title: League crashing because of Lag?
body: So I've been playing league on my laptop for quite a bit and then one time i played a game it started lagging like hell then it crashed my laptop is there a fix because im going to sydney in 3 days i really wanna play lol there

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds like your laptop might be having some issues with the GPU overheating or you have excess tasks running the background that are eating up resources.

Next time you're playing you should close any unneeded programs before starting the game, I'd also recommend checking your GPU/CPU temps while playing and make sure they're not running too hot, there are many free tools to accomplish this, my favourite being [SpeedFan](http://www.almico.com/speedfan.php).

You should also update your graphics drivers if there is an update available, just to rule out any driver issues before tackling potential failure/overheating of the gpu.

* Does your laptop meet the minimum specs required for LoL to run properly? 
* How old is the laptop? 
* When was the last time you had the inside of your laptop cleaned out, it's possible there could be dust buildup around your cooling fans causing heat not to be properly dissipated.
My laptop is about 3 years old and i do not know about the fans and thanks
